author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were killed in road accidents in the town and near Tiruvattar on Friday.

According to police, Suman (23), a taxi driver from Mekka Mandapam near Verkilambi, was killed in a road accident near Parvathipuram.

The victim was riding a motorcycle when an omni bus proceeding to Thiruvananthapuram from Chennai hit him.

He was also hit by a car which was following the bus. Suman was thrown away in the impact and died on the spot. The body was shifted to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital for post mortem. Nagercoil Traffic Investigation wing have registered a case.

In the other accident, tempo driver Mani of Sidharal near Thiruvattar dashed against an electrical post near Themanur. Mani was immediately shifted to Kuzhithurai Government Hospital where doctors pronounced him dead.

Thiruvattar police registered a case and are investigating.
title: Two killed in accidents
